Kit conventions

  • a loader must have a maximum of 2 steps
  • a loader cannot be composed of multiple component sets, still it can use multiple instances of the same component set
  • a loader should use a single color, still opacity can be modified. This is required by the color switching animation on hover. It can be ignored if the loader is used differently.
